title: Minecraft Java版 18w07a 发布
author: 广药
txt_content:
本帖最后由 WuGuangYao2012 于 2018-2-15 11:39 编辑 
每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。 
 然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
 Minecraft 1.13 仍未发布，18w07a为其第18个预览版。

MINECRAFT SNAPSHOT 18W07AA Minecraft Java Edition snapshotJava版1.13快照 18W07A
Today is Valentines Day! We couldn't think of any better way to show our love for you than to give you a snapshot full of new things. <3今天是情人节！除了一个充满新东西的新快照，我们想不出用什么来表达我们对你的爱啦！<3


CHANGES IN 18W07A18W07A变更列表
Added Phantoms (MineCon voted mob!)新增 Phantoms （Minecon投票生物/生物B）Added Turtles新增 海龟Added new swimming ability (sprint underwater!)新增 新的水下能力（水下游泳）Added bubble columns新增 气泡柱Added ability to strip logs新增了剥皮的原木Added new trident weapon新增武器 三叉戟Squids now shoot ink to defend themselves鱿鱼现在用墨汁来保护自己（一个基岩版3年前加入的东西233）Added new kelp and sea grass blocks新增 海带和海草方块Items in water now float to the top水中掉落的物品现在会浮到上面Added new prismarine stairs and slabs新增了海晶石台阶与半砖



PHANTOMS（译名？？？）
You look tired. When's the last time you got a decent night's rest? Bad things happen to those who don't sleep... they start to hallucinate, and see what's really there.你看起来很累了，上次睡一个美觉是什么时候来着？那些不睡觉的人身上经常发生一些不好的事情，比如开始产生幻觉... 然后看到了真正存在的东西Spawns in the overworld and the end在主世界和末地中生成Attacks players who haven't slept in a while攻击一段时间没有睡觉的玩家Drops leather, but this may change掉落皮革，但这可能会进行更改



TURTLES海龟The turtle moves.海龟在爬！Spawns on warm beaches, but this is temporary在温暖的沙滩上生成，但这是暂时的Will lay eggs in their home beach在它们生成的沙滩上下蛋You can craft pieces of their old shell into one big shell你可以用他们的龟壳片制作一个大龟壳
And wear it on your head!
可以戴到头上！
Or craft it into a potion!
或者用来酿造！Turtles are known for their strength, not their speed海龟以力量而闻名，而不是速度Please be kind to turtles. They hold up the world.请善待海龟，他们撑起了整个世界

KELP AND SEAGRASS海带和海草The green in the blue!
蓝色中的一抹绿！
Seagrass generates in all oceans, but this is temporary海草生成在所有海洋里，但这只是暂时的Kelp doesn't generate in deep oceans, but this is temporary海带不会在深海中生成，但这只是暂时的Kelp can be smelted to get dry kelp海带可以被熔炼成干海带
A tasty snack for the ocean adventurer!
为海洋冒险家准备的美味小吃！
Or a convenient way to fuel more smelting
或者是一种加速熔炼的方式
Or just store it away into a dried kelp block
或者仅仅是存放在干燥的海带块中



BUBBLE COLUMNS气泡柱Blub blub blub blub.
噗噜噗噜Doesn't generate anywhere currently目前不会生成在任何地方Occurs when a magma block is in water当岩浆块被放入水中时产生Watch out, you'll get sucked under!小心点！你会被吸进去！A good way to breath without cheating game mechanics ;)一个没有欺骗游戏机制下呼吸的好方法！




STRIPPED LOGS剥皮的原木
Go ahead, axe us a question.去吧！You can strip logs by using an axe on them (right-click)你可以用斧子去除原木的树皮（右击）Stripped logs act like regular logs in furnaces, crafting, etc剥皮的原木就还可以像之前那样用来合成或者熔炼They look neat!看起来很整洁！


TRIDENTS三叉戟
Some say that throwing your only weapon away is a bad idea. We disagree.有些人说扔掉你的武器不是个好办法，但我们可不同意Right click to throw the trident右击扔出三叉戟Left click to melee左击攻击Currently unobtainable in survival, that will change目前在生存中无法获得，但这会进行改动Super overpowered, we'll balance them later超级强！我们会在晚些时候平衡下Has 4 available enchantments有四个可用的附魔

Loyalty: Your trident will come back to you. Spoil-sport.忠诚：你的三叉戟扔出后会回来，别扫兴了Impaling: Very useful against creatures of the sea.Impaling（突刺？）：对海洋生物很有用处Riptide: Gotta go fast.Riptide（激流？）：走的快点Channeling: We're not sure. It's pretty spooky.Channeling（引导？）：我们也不确定，这很恐怖UI icon is not yet implementedUI界面暂未完成



FIXED BUGSBUG修复MC-11208 - The big tree generator handles tree height variable incorrectlyMC-11208 -  树生成器错误地处理了树的高度MC-124890 - Can't insert charcoal into furnaceMC-124890 - 不能将木炭放入熔炉
MC-124902 - Furnace recipes work in crafting interfaces and interfere with crafting recipesMC-124902 - 熔炉配方显示在合成配方界面MC-124903 - Random crash in snow biomes: java.lang.NullPointerException: Exception ticking worldMC-124903 - 雪生物群系中的随机崩溃：java.lang.NullPointerException：Exception ticking worldMC-124913 - Horses, rabbit, parrot, llamas and sheep generate with default color / variant onlyMC-124913 - 马，兔子，鹦鹉，羊驼和羊只生成默认颜色/变种MC-124916 - Chorus plant generation brokenMC-124916 - 紫颂植物生成时没有进行连接MC-124930 - The game crashes when pressing "show craftable" in the furnace recipe book.MC-124930 - 在熔炉合成表中按下“显示合成表”时游戏崩溃。MC-124952 - Large oak trees fail to generate in all biomes with the new generatorMC-124952 -使用了新世界生成器后，大型橡树无法在所有生物群落中生成MC-125016 - Debug world does not generateMC-125016 - 调试世界不会生成MC-125047 - World generator not fully cleaned before making new worldMC-125047 - 在创造新世界之前，世界生成器没有被完全清除



 转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
     Please report any and all bugs you find in Minecraft to bugs.mojang.com. If nobody reports a bug, we can’t fix it! experimental development snapshots” and save. To switch to the normal version, you can select it in the dropdown at the bottom left corner of the launcher. Back up your world first or run the game on in a different folder (See the “new profile” dialog). Snapshots can corrupt your world, please backup and/or run them in a different folder from your main worlds. 请在http://bugs.mojang.com报告Minecraft中的BUG。如果没人汇报BUG的话，我们无法修复它！ 如果你想试玩快照，请打开官方启动器并点击“New Profile”按钮，选中“snapshots”并选择“Enable experimental development snapshots”并点击保存。如果想切换到普通的版本，你可以在启动器左下角按钮上方的下拉菜单中选择。在开始快照前备份你的世界或在不同的文件夹中启动快照（见“new profile”对话框）。 快照可能会玩坏你的存档，请千万记得备份存档和/或在与你的存档不同文件夹里运行。
 
服务器Jar： http://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/18w06a/minecraft_server.18w07a.jar
  正版启动器下载地址Windowshttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.exeMac/OSXhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraf ... er/Minecraft.jar
 关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 Minecraft 1.13特性列表 的更新。
 预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。但由于亚马逊服务器https连接在国内时常不稳定，官方启动器下载游戏可能需要vpn。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验快照版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。目前绝大多数主流启动器都带有游戏下载功能。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。
 
 外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪 Mojang官方博客（英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
